title: File Selection Specifier Base
description: Used to specify a selection of one or more files.

sourcePath.description: The target folder, relative to the project root. Settings such as "includeGlobs" and "excludeGlobs" will be resolved relative to this folder. If no globs or file extensions are specified, the folder will be used as-is. If this parameter is not provided, defaults to the project root.

fileExtensions.description: If specified, this option recursively scans all folders under "sourcePath" and includes any files that match the specified extensions.  (If "fileExtensions" and "includeGlobs" are both specified, their selections are added together.)

excludeGlobs.description: A list of glob patterns that exclude files or folders from being selected.  The paths are resolved relative to "sourcePath".  These exclusions eliminate items that were selected by the "includeGlobs" or "fileExtensions" setting.

includeGlobs.description: A list of glob patterns that select files to be included.  The paths are resolved relative to "sourcePath".
